verses.verse: לַמְנַצֵּ֥חַ <WH5329> lam-natz-Tze-acho the chief Musician; לִידִיתוּן[T[li-di-tun כלִֽידוּת֗וּן <WH3038> li-du-Tun, Jeduthun קמִזְמ֥וֹר <WH4210> miz-Mor A Psalm לְדָוִֽד׃ <WH1732> le-da-Vid. of David אָמַ֗רְתִּי <WH559> 'a-Mar-ti, I said אֶֽשְׁמְרָ֣ה <WH8104> 'esh-me-Rah I will take heed דְרָכַי֮ <WH1870> de-ra-Chai to my ways מֵחֲט֪וֹא <WH2398> me-cha-To that I sin בִלְשׁ֫וֹנִ֥י <WH3956> vil-Sho-Ni not with my tongue אֶשְׁמְרָ֥ה <WH8104> 'esh-me-Rah I will keep לְפִ֥י <WH6310> le-Fi my mouth מַחְס֑וֹם <WH4269> mach-Som; with a bridle בְּעֹ֖ד <WH5704> be-'Od against רָשָׁ֣ע <WH7563> ra-Sha' while the wicked לְנֶגְדִּֽי׃ <WH5048> le-neg-Di. my presence

נֶאֱלַ֣מְתִּי <WH481> ne-'e-Lam-ti I was dumb ד֭וּמִיָּה <WH1747> Du-mi-yah with silence הֶחֱשֵׁ֣יתִי <WH2814> he-che-Shei-ti I held my peace מִטּ֑וֹב <WH2896> mit-Tov; [even] from good וּכְאֵבִ֥י <WH3511> u-che-'e-Vi and my sorrow נֶעְכָּֽר׃ <WH5916> ne'-Kar. was stirred

חַם־ <WH2552> cham- was hot לִבִּ֨י׀ <WH3820> lib-Bi My heart בְּקִרְבִּ֗י <WH7130> be-kir-Bi, within בַּהֲגִיגִ֥י <WH1901> ba-ha-gi-Gi me while I was musing תִבְעַר־ <WH1197> tiv-'ar- burned אֵ֑שׁ <WH784> 'Esh; the fire דִּ֝בַּ֗רְתִּי <WH1696> dib-Bar-ti, spake בִּלְשֽׁוֹנִי׃ <WH3956> bil-Sho-ni. I with my tongue

הוֹדִ֘יעֵ֤נִי <WH3045> ho-Di-'E-ni make me to know יְהוָ֨ה׀ <WH3068> Yah-weh LORD קִצִּ֗י <WH7093> kitz-Tzi, mine end וּמִדַּ֣ת <WH4060> u-mid-Dat and the measure יָמַ֣י <WH3117> ya-Mai of my days מַה־ <WH4100> mah- and what הִ֑יא <WH1931> Hi; me אֵ֝דְעָ֗ה <WH3045> 'e-de-'Ah, what it [is that] I may know מֶה־ <WH4100> meh- how חָדֵ֥ל <WH2310> cha-Del how frail אָֽנִי׃ <WH589> 'A-ni. I

הִנֵּ֤ה <WH2009> hin-Neh Behold טְפָח֨וֹת׀ <WH2947> te-fa-Chot [as] an handbreadth נָ֘תַ֤תָּה <WH5414> na-Tat-tah Behold thou hast made יָמַ֗י <WH3117> ya-Mai, my days וְחֶלְדִּ֣י <WH2465> ve-chel-Di and mine age כְאַ֣יִן <WH369> che-'A-yin nothing נֶגְדֶּ֑ךָ <WH5048> neg-De-cha; your sight אַ֥ךְ <WH389> 'ach Surely כָּֽל־ <WH3605> kal- [is] as nothing before thee verily every הֶ֥בֶל <WH1892> He-vel vanity כָּל־ <WH3605> kol- [is] altogether אָ֝דָ֗ם <WH120> 'a-Dam, man נִצָּ֥ב <WH5324> nitz-Tzav at his best state סֶֽלָה׃ <WH5542> Se-lah. Selah

אַךְ־ <WH389> 'ach- Surely בְּצֶ֤לֶם׀ <WH6754> be-Tze-lem in a vain shew יִֽתְהַלֶּךְ־ <WH1980> yit-hal-lech- walketh אִ֗ישׁ <WH376> 'Ish, Surely every man אַךְ־ <WH389> 'ach- Surely הֶ֥בֶל <WH1892> He-vel in vain יֶהֱמָי֑וּן <WH1993> ye-he-ma-Yun; surely they are disquieted יִ֝צְבֹּ֗ר <WH6651> yitz-Bor, he heapeth up וְֽלֹא־ <WH3808> ve-lo- and does not יֵדַ֥ע <WH3045> ye-Da' [riches] and knoweth מִי־ <WH4310> mi- who אֹסְפָֽם׃ <WH622> 'o-se-Fam. not who shall gather

וְעַתָּ֣ה <WH6258> ve-'at-Tah and now מַה־ <WH4100> mah- what קִּוִּ֣יתִי <WH6960> kiv-Vi-ti what wait אֲדֹנָ֑י <WH136> 'a-do-Nai; And now Lord תּ֝וֹחַלְתִּ֗י <WH8431> to-chal-Ti, I for;my hope לְךָ֣ le-Cha הִֽיא׃ <WH1931> Hi. he

מִכָּל־ <WH3605> mik-kol all פְּשָׁעַ֥י <WH6588> pe-sha-'Ai me from all my transgressions הַצִּילֵ֑נִי <WH5337> hatz-tzi-Le-ni; Deliver חֶרְפַּ֥ת <WH2781> cher-Pat me not the reproach נָ֝בָ֗ל <WH5036> na-Val, of the foolish אַל־ <WH408> 'al- nay תְּשִׂימֵֽנִי׃ <WH7760> te-si-Me-ni. make

נֶ֭אֱלַמְתִּי <WH481> Ne-'e-lam-ti I was dumb לֹ֣א <WH3808> lo not אֶפְתַּח־ <WH6605> 'ef-tach- I opened פִּ֑י <WH6310> Pi; not my mouth כִּ֖י <WH3588> ki Because אַתָּ֣ה <WH859> 'at-Tah who עָשִֽׂיתָ׃ <WH6213> 'a-Si-ta. because thou didst

הָסֵ֣ר <WH5493> ha-Ser away מֵעָלַ֣י <WH5921> me-'a-Lai and נִגְעֶ֑ךָ <WH5061> nig-'E-cha; thy stroke מִתִּגְרַ֥ת <WH8409> mit-tig-Rat by the blow יָ֝דְךָ֗ <WH3027> ya-de-cha, of thine hand אֲנִ֣י <WH589> 'a-Ni I am כָלִֽיתִי׃ <WH3615> cha-Li-ti. from me I am consumed

בְּֽתוֹכָ֘ח֤וֹת <WH8433> be-to-Cha-Chot When thou with rebukes עַל־ <WH5921> 'al- for עָוֹ֨ן׀ <WH5771> 'a-Von for iniquity יִסַּ֬רְתָּ <WH3256> yis-Sar-ta dost correct אִ֗ישׁ <WH376> 'Ish, man וַתֶּ֣מֶס <WH4529> vat-Te-mes to consume away כָּעָ֣שׁ <WH6211> ka-'Ash like a moth חֲמוּד֑וֹ <WH2530> cha-mu-Do; thou makest his beauty אַ֤ךְ <WH389> 'ach Surely הֶ֖בֶל <WH1892> He-vel [is] vanity כָּל־ <WH3605> kol- every אָדָ֣ם <WH120> 'a-Dam surely every man סֶֽלָה׃ <WH5542> Se-lah. Selah

שִֽׁמְעָ֥ה־ <WH8085> shim-'Ah- Hear תְפִלָּתִ֨י׀ <WH8605> te-fil-la-Ti my prayer יְהוָ֡ה <WH3068> Yah-weh O LORD וְשַׁוְעָתִ֨י׀ <WH7775> ve-shav-'a-Ti unto my cry הַאֲזִינָה֮ <WH238> ha-'a-zi-Nah and give ear אֶֽל־ <WH413> 'el- at דִּמְעָתִ֗י <WH1832> dim-'a-Ti, at my tears אַֽל־ <WH408> 'al- not תֶּ֫חֱרַ֥שׁ <WH2790> te-che-Rash hold not thy peace כִּ֤י <WH3588> ki I am a גֵ֣ר <WH1616> ger for I [am] a stranger אָנֹכִ֣י <WH595> 'a-no-Chi I עִמָּ֑ךְ <WH5973> 'im-Mach; You תּ֝וֹשָׁ֗ב <WH8453> to-Shav, with thee [and] a sojourner כְּכָל־ <WH3605> ke-chol- all אֲבוֹתָֽי׃ <WH1> a-vo-Tai. as all my fathers

הָשַׁ֣ע <WH8159> ha-Sha' O spare מִמֶּ֣נִּי <WH4480> mi-Men-ni at וְאַבְלִ֑יגָה <WH1082> ve-'av-Li-gah; me that I may recover strength בְּטֶ֖רֶם <WH2962> be-Te-rem Before אֵלֵ֣ךְ <WH1980> 'e-Lech depart וְאֵינֶֽנִּי׃ <WH369> ve-'ei-Nen-ni. no
